name: Leave Balance Report
query:
SELECT 
    lb.employee_name AS "Employee Name::150",
    lb.employee_id AS "Employee ID::100",
    MAX(CASE WHEN TRIM(lc.leave_type) = 'Annual Leave' THEN lc.remaining_leaves ELSE 0 END) AS "Annual Leave::120",
    MAX(CASE WHEN TRIM(lc.leave_type) = 'Casual Leave' THEN lc.remaining_leaves ELSE 0 END) AS "Casual Leave::120",
    MAX(CASE WHEN TRIM(lc.leave_type) = 'Privilege Leave' THEN lc.remaining_leaves ELSE 0 END) AS "Privilege Leave::120",
    MAX(CASE WHEN TRIM(lc.leave_type) = 'Sick Leave' THEN lc.remaining_leaves ELSE 0 END) AS "Sick Leave::120"
FROM 
    `tabLeave Balances` lb
INNER JOIN 
    `tabRemaining Leaves` lc
ON 
    lb.name = lc.parent
GROUP BY 
    lb.employee_name, lb.employee_id
ORDER BY 
    lb.employee_name;
